definitions.definition: Having or demonstrating undivided and constant support for someone or something.
examples: Dogs are very loyal animals, which is why they make wonderful pets.
George is a loyal and loving husband.

definitions.definition: Firm in allegiance to a person or institution ; allegiant.
Faithful to a person or cause .
examples: We must remain loyal to the mission.

main_definition: Having or demonstrating undivided and constant support for someone or something.
secondary_definitions: Firm in allegiance to a person or institution ; allegiant.
Faithful to a person or cause .
